token-color-marker.trash-button-title: Click to remove deleted color markers from token

enable-button.Name: Display Token Color Marker Button
enable-button.Hint: Controls whether or not the Token Color Marker palatte can be opened from the token hud

enable-button-for-gm-only.Name: Display Button for the GM only
enable-button-for-gm-only.Hint: Controls whether or not the button is displayed for only the GM

color-manager-menu.Name: Color Settings
color-manager-menu.Label: My Color Settings
color-manager-menu.Hint: This is where the colors can be customized

enable-mono-Icon.Name: Use Monochrome Icon
enable-mono-Icon.Hint: Controls which icon will be used for the button either rainbow gradient or monochrome.

enable-icon-in-chat-message.Name: Show Color Markers In Chat Message
enable-icon-in-chat-message.Hint: Shows the token color markers by the tarket's name in the chat message.

max-font-size.Name: Max Pixel Size Of Marker Text
max-font-size.Hint: This is the max pixel size for text added to a marker. Requires a refresh to update current marker text size.

deleteConfirm.Title: Confirm Deletion
deleteConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to delete this color? This action cannot be undone.
